Description.Text: Kazzhol Astana is a friendly 4-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of Astana. Highlights include an indoor swimming pool, a fitness centre, private massage treatment rooms and a sauna. Astana is the fast-growing capital of Kazakhstan and home to several multinational companies. In its centre old Soviet buildings sit next to innovative structures, offering an interesting blend of traditional and futuristic styles. Places of interest include the Baiterek Tower, the Khan Shatyry and The President's Museum of Kazakhstan. Astana train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Astana destinations. The hotel is housed in a 20th-century high-rise building. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, a fitness centre, private massage treatment rooms and a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 25sqm and decorated in a comfortable, traditional style. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, a mini-bar, a safe, a telephone and a work desk. The en-suite bathroom features a bathtub with integrated shower and a hairdryer. Fergana Restaurant serves local and international cuisine in an elegant setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
